entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Drizzle at times heavy or rain showers changing to snow overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2 except minus 7 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 2 except minus 7 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
